summary: Hot-spring pool and Home on the outskirts of Riverwood
descriptionHtml:
Get your Speedos on!
A hot spring pool carved out of solid magical [probably] rock and home for you and companions to relax in.
This mod was designed to be lore-friendly and detailed, it\'s not overpowered and it is not a fortress.
There are some skill books, weapons and even some Synpathy Specials, but you don\'t have to use them if you don\'t want to, sell them for some mead coin.

*********UPDATED V1B:*********
Community requests minor update:
Added Crafting Workbench to boiler/smelter room
Added Crafting Anvil (Forge) to boiler/smelter room
Nav-mesh tweaks
Misc tweaks

Features:
Sit and relax with your followers in the Hot Spring Pool [inc. small shrine]
Fast-Travel from inside the home
Work benches, echanters and alchemy
Synpathy Specials slightly altered Weapons/Armor
Boiler/Smelter Room
Skill books
Potions
Horses
Plenty of named/unnamed containers for your loot
Lots for followers to do inside and outside
and a lot of extra detail to the landscape around the home/hot spring to pretty it up.

Any problems or bugs let me know here...Thanks

Enjoy!

Synpathy
author: Synpathy

files.name: HotSpringHome V1 - Historical Pre-Community request update
